thread.title: New York Lawmakers to Vet Interim Attorney General Candidates

author: Kate King
title: New York Lawmakers to Vet Interim Attorney General Candidates
text:
New York lawmakers are set to interview more than a dozen candidates as possible temporary successors to former Attorney General Eric Schneiderman, who resigned last week following allegations of abuse.
Assemblyman Joseph Lentol, a Democrat from Brooklyn, will head a bipartisan committee of eight lawmakers from the state Senate and Assembly that is scheduled to begin public hearings Tuesday to question candidates for the post of interim attorney general.
...
